description: News about Samuel G. Freedman: On Religion, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Samuel G. Freedman: On Religion
title_page: Samuel G. Freedman: On Religion - The New York Times
maintext:
Op-Ed Contributor
Politics Has Always Had a Place in Football
The sport was not incidental to the doctrine of segregation. It was one of the pillars on which it rested.
